hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Try holding a D-pad button on the item screen.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that you can have complete control over the item placement, item pool, and more, using Plandomizer?

GV (Waterfall).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #the Goron Mask# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Forest Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #4# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Elevator Above Maze Hookshot Wonderitem 4

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides the #Lost Woods Stage#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.
